name: Motavation
description: Motavation, first bred by Magus Seeds, is an indica-dominant hybrid strain that combines genetics from Sensi Star and Warlock. While its name may suggest a boost of energy and focus, don’t let yourself be deceived: Motavation typically locks you to the couch in a blissful state of relaxed happiness. However, many consumers do report cerebral engagement conducive for creativity, but whether or not you have the energy to make anything of it is another story. This mostly indica cannabis strain has a sweet, fruity and floral aroma that is accented by a sour chemical smell, and patients report Motavation’s success in treating anxiety, muscle spasms, pain, and insomnia.
descriptionPlain: Motavation, first bred by Magus Seeds, is an indica-dominant hybrid strain that combines genetics from Sensi Star and Warlock. While its name may suggest a boost of energy and focus, don’t let yourself be deceived: Motavation typically locks you to the couch in a blissful state of relaxed happiness. However, many consumers do report cerebral engagement conducive for creativity, but whether or not you have the energy to make anything of it is another story. This mostly indica cannabis strain has a sweet, fruity and floral aroma that is accented by a sour chemical smell, and patients report Motavation’s success in treating anxiety, muscle spasms, pain, and insomnia.

highlightedReviews.text: Excellent Indica hybrid. Smells of Lemon Turpentine. Great dreamy effects. Excellent for pain especially neuropathic pain.

One of the best indica dominant hybrid strains. Is a current favorite. Covered in trichomes with massive calyxs,  smells like a skunky pine/sweetish darker green slightly purple buds with red hairs . Great stuff anytime!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Motavation, Leonidas, Blue Cookies, Bogart, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
​Another batch of new strains have been entered, and we're curious to see how many you've tried! We've got new Girl Scout Cookie hybrids for the Cookie lovers and Spartan warlord-themed sativas for fans of brutality ripped dudes in capes. Even more new varieties can be found in the Leafly Explorer (remember: you can sort by newest or you can use our strain filters to select from custom effects, flavors, and benefits).
All right, strain hunters — go forth, explore, and document your adventures in a strain review!
 
 1. Motavation
Characteristics of Motavation:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Sensi Star and Warlock
Sweet, fruity, and floral aroma
Heavy and relaxing with some creativity
May help with anxiety, muscle spasms, pain, and insomnia

 
 2. Leonidas
Characteristics of Leonidas:

Mostly sativa strain
Super Silver Haze variation produced by Canadian LP Tweed
Cross between Haze, Skunk #1, and Northern Lights
Happy, focused effects
Sour citrus aroma
May help with depression, fatigue, and stress

 
 3. Blue Cookies
Characteristics of Blue Cookies:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Blueberry
Sweet berry and cherry aroma
Intense cerebral euphoria coupled with full-body relaxation

 
 4. Nova
Characteristics of Nova:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Canadian LP Tweed’s version of Pennywise
Sweet woody and spicy pepper aroma
Relaxed and focused effects
May help treat pain, anxiety, inflammation, and stress disorders

 
 5. Bogart
Characteristics of Bogart:

Hybrid strain
A rendition of OG Kush distributed by Canadian LP Tweed 
Earthy, woody pine aroma
Suitable for consumers with a high tolerance
May help with PTSD, nausea, pain, and stress.

 
 6. Super Bud
Characteristics of Super Bud:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Big Bud and Skunk
Sweet, fruity aroma
Heavily relaxing effects

 
 7. Sunshine
Characteristics of Sunshine:

Sativa-dominant strain
Produced by the Canadian LP Peace Naturals Project
Sweet fruity and citrus flavors
Blissful, happy, uplifted effects
May help treat pain, nausea, and appetite loss

growInfo.growNotes: For an even canopy, some bending in first 2 weeks of flowering is recommended for growers using CFL lighting
